REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0030 reute d f BC-CONDOR-COMPUTER-INTRO 03-02 0058

TEXT.TITLE: CONDOR COMPUTER INTRODUCES DATABASE PRODUCT
TEXT.BODY: <Condor Computer Corp> said it is offering a 3.5-inch floppy diskette version of its Condor 3 Database Management System. Th company said the new version contains all the features of its 5.25-inch package, including report writer and applications automation functions. Reuter
